about_the_game:
You can customize your beloved cat in detail.
Each cat living in the town, including lost cats, has unique features, totaling around 26,000 patterns!
Since the town is randomly generated, its structure changes every time.
The Cat have a level of fullness and Cheeriness:

Fullness: The cat stops running when it's hungry.
Cheeriness: If your cat's cheeriness is low, it won't come near you even if you call it.

You can replenish the cat's fullness by buying a dish and cat food.
When you go out with your cat, its cheeriness improves, and it may occasionally find treasures.
By taking on the job of finding lost cats, you can furnish your home with furniture and cat items, enhancing your life with your beloved cat!
Since it's a life simulation, you can also simply spend time observing the many cats in town without working.
There is also a light opening and ending, and the ending can be purchased with money, a novel specification.

* The town's cats, like my own cat, can have nearly infinite patterns of physical features, but with such slight differences that they're not visually distinguishable, so I've deliberately limited them to 26,000 patterns.

You have moved to a town where only people living with cats can reside.
In this town, many cats live freely and independently.
When you were approached at a shop in town, you were asked to take on the job of finding lost cats.
Determined to enrich your life with your beloved cat, you decide to take on the job.

Please read and abide by the following terms and conditions.

  • Include the game name "NEKOTO" in the title or hashtag.
  • Please include the game store URL here in the summary section so that viewers can access it.
  • Please refrain from live broadcasts or distributing the game in such a way as to spoil important scenes in detail. : "NEKOTO" is all OK.
  • Verbal abuse, slander, offenses against public order and morals or social norms, and any other activity or distribution that disrupts the world view of the game is prohibited.
  • Streams or broadcasts that require payment for viewing, such as membership or exclusive member content, are prohibited.
  • I will not be held responsible for any damages or troubles that may arise from live broadcasts or distribution.

If you comply with the above, I will allow you to monetize your videos through the monetization function of the video site.
If there are any violations, I may request removal of the video.
I reserve the right to change these terms and conditions at any time without notice.
detailed_description:
SNS


About the Game

You can customize your beloved cat in detail.
Each cat living in the town, including lost cats, has unique features, totaling around 26,000 patterns!
Since the town is randomly generated, its structure changes every time.
The Cat have a level of fullness and Cheeriness:

Fullness: The cat stops running when it's hungry.
Cheeriness: If your cat's cheeriness is low, it won't come near you even if you call it.

You can replenish the cat's fullness by buying a dish and cat food.
When you go out with your cat, its cheeriness improves, and it may occasionally find treasures.
By taking on the job of finding lost cats, you can furnish your home with furniture and cat items, enhancing your life with your beloved cat!
Since it's a life simulation, you can also simply spend time observing the many cats in town without working.
There is also a light opening and ending, and the ending can be purchased with money, a novel specification.

* The town's cats, like my own cat, can have nearly infinite patterns of physical features, but with such slight differences that they're not visually distinguishable, so I've deliberately limited them to 26,000 patterns.

You have moved to a town where only people living with cats can reside.
In this town, many cats live freely and independently.
When you were approached at a shop in town, you were asked to take on the job of finding lost cats.
Determined to enrich your life with your beloved cat, you decide to take on the job.

Please read and abide by the following terms and conditions.

  • Include the game name "NEKOTO" in the title or hashtag.
  • Please include the game store URL here in the summary section so that viewers can access it.
  • Please refrain from live broadcasts or distributing the game in such a way as to spoil important scenes in detail. : "NEKOTO" is all OK.
  • Verbal abuse, slander, offenses against public order and morals or social norms, and any other activity or distribution that disrupts the world view of the game is prohibited.
  • Streams or broadcasts that require payment for viewing, such as membership or exclusive member content, are prohibited.
  • I will not be held responsible for any damages or troubles that may arise from live broadcasts or distribution.

If you comply with the above, I will allow you to monetize your videos through the monetization function of the video site.
If there are any violations, I may request removal of the video.
I reserve the right to change these terms and conditions at any time without notice.
name: NEKOTO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A PC with lower specs may still run the game, but no guarantee.

short_description: Customize your beloved cat in detail and live together! Enhance your life with your cat by working as a lost cat finder. When you go out with your cat, it collects treasures. Each cat in the town has unique traits, around 26,000 patterns! Towns randomly generate, changing each time!
